title: New: Jacob Aria – All The World Is Good
body:
A student at London’s Goldsmiths College, **Jacob Aria** (Jacob Cheetham) has just dropped his ‘debut’ track, _All The World Is Good_.

Odd-pop at it’s finest, there’s hints of Bowie alongside Depeche Mode, with layers of synths and his foreboding vocals building beautifully to an eerie finale. Check out _All The World Is Good Below_.
